#summary An Introduction to the Edit Object menu in the Admin CP
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

The Edit Object menu is where you got to edit items, categories and pages.


= Menu Items =

 *[EditItem] - Edit a product
 *[EditCategory] - Edit a product category
 *[EditPrivacyPolicy] - Edit the Privacy Policy
 *[EditDisclaimer] - Edit the Disclaimer
 *[EditTermsandConditions] - Edit the Terms and conditions
 *[EditHomePage] - Edit the Home Page
 *[EditAboutPage] - Edit the About Page
 *[EditContactPage] - Edit the Contact Page
